templates.name: Turborepo Boilerplate
templates.description: A highly opinionated mono repo boilerplate with TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier, and more. Aimed at developers who want to get started with a mono repo quickly.

templates.name: React Vite Boilerplate
templates.description: A highly opinionated React boilerplate with Vite, TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier, and more. Aimed at developers who want to get started with React quickly.

customOptions.name: srcDir
customOptions.message: Sub directory to put all source content (.e.g. `src`, `app`). Leave blank to use the root directory.

customOptions.name: projectImportPath
customOptions.message: Import alias to use for the project, e.g. `@/`

templates.name: Web Extension React Boilerplate
templates.description: A highly opinionated WebExtension boilerplate with React, Vite, TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier, and more. Aimed at developers who want to get started with WebExtension quickly.

customOptions.name: srcDir
customOptions.message: Sub directory to put all source content (.e.g. `src`, `app`). Leave blank to use the root directory.

customOptions.name: projectImportPath
customOptions.message: Import alias to use for the project, e.g. `@/`

templates.name: WebdriverIO Boilerplate
templates.description: A highly opinionated WebdriverIO boilerplate with TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier, Selenoid, and more. Aimed at developers who want to get started with WebdriverIO quickly.

templates.name: AWS AppSync + TypeScript
templates.description: Serverless Framework example to deploy an AWS AppSync API using TypeScript. It also has a local development environment using [Serverless Offline](https://www.serverless.com/plugins/serverless-offline).

templates.name: AWS AppSync + Python
templates.description: Serverless Framework example to deploy an AWS AppSync API using Python. It also has a local development environment using [Serverless Offline](https://www.serverless.com/plugins/serverless-offline).

templates.name: AWS Glue with Python Shell and PySpark Jobs
templates.description: Serverless Framework example to deploy an AWS Glue job using Python Shell and PySpark.

templates.name: Neo4j in EC2
templates.description: Serverless Framework example to deploy a Neo4j instance in EC2.

templates.name: Serverless S3 Local
templates.description: Serverless Framework example to run a lambda function locally using [Serverless S3 Local](https://www.serverless.com/plugins/serverless-s3-local).

templates.name: Serverless SQS offline + TypeScript + ElasticMQ Example
templates.description: Serverless Framework example to run lambda functions locally using [Serverless Offline SQS](https://www.serverless.com/plugins/serverless-offline-sqs) with ElasticMQ. It provides a full local development environment using [Serverless Offline](https://www.serverless.com/plugins/serverless-offline).

templates.name: Start and Stop EC2 Instances with AWS Lambda
templates.description: Serverless Framework example to start and stop EC2 instances using AWS Lambda.

templates.name: DocumentDB Cluster
templates.description: Serverless Framework example to deploy a DocumentDB cluster with all the necessary resources.

templates.name: RDS Postgres Instance
templates.description: Serverless Framework example to deploy a RDS Postgres cluster with all the necessary resources.

templates.name: Serverless Middy
templates.description: Serverless Framework example to deploy a lambda function using [Middy](https://middy.js.org/), the stylish Node.js middleware engine for AWS Lambda.

templates.name: Serverless Middy with Custom Middleware
templates.description: Serverless Framework example to deploy a lambda function using [Middy](https://middy.js.org/), the stylish Node.js middleware engine for AWS Lambda.

templates.name: Serverless Nest Application with TypeScript
templates.description: Serverless Framework example to deploy a NestJS application using TypeScript.

templates.name: AWS Cognito Local Example
templates.description: AWS Cognito local enviroment with Docker and Serverless offline

extensions.name: GitHub Setup
